attributes.action: Prosecute Gulf states for human rights abuse
attributes.additional_details: The abuse of migrant workers from the South Asian countries to the Gulf has reached epademic proportions. The rulers in the Gulf states will not bring their cruel citizens to justice conseqently they condone flagrant human ritghts abuse.The government must ensure that the Gulf states undemocratic rulers be brougt to justice before the human rights court and punished.

rejection.details: You need to set out clearly what action you would like the Government to take
